Posts.Content: I have been on Arimidex for almost 5 years without much side effects. I had breast cancer Stage IIA, had double mastectomies, chemo and radiation. Last week and today I noticed spotting (have not had a period in over 5 years). I am very concerned about this. Two weeks ago my gyn gave me some estrogen cream to apply sparingly to relieve vaginal dryness. I don't use it every day, maybe I have used it 2-3 times. I also wonder if it could be related to this. I had an abdominal/pelvic CT last month bec of abdominal pain, but it was negative/ I could use some expert words from experienced patients! Can't do much til Monday bec of the weekend. Many thanks MiasNY
Posts.Title: spotting on Airimdex?

Posts.Content: Almost at the end of 5 years of Arimidex after mastectomies, chemo and radiatyion 5 years ago. Had Stage IIa 1 cm cancer with no axillary nodes and 2 sentinel nodes. Have not had bad side effects at all. I feel "protected" and safe taking this anticancer med and want to know if any one here is aware of any data supporting the continuation of the medication after 5 years. Thank you very much. Miasny
Posts.Title: Arimidex for more than 5 years? Any data or news?
